original:
Oh, ^P! 
Perfect timing!
Did you see that? 
You totally saw it, right? Right??
Something happened...
A 'ka-boom!' from beyond that hill!
translation:
Oh, ^P! 
Perfect timing!
Did you see that? 
You totally saw it, right? Right??
Something happened...
A 'ka-boom!' from beyond that hill!

original:
See, I told you I wasn't lying,
Takuto!
translation:
See, I told you I wasn't lying,
Takuto!

original:
Well, knowing you Hiroyuki,
of course I wouldn't believe it!
But since ^P saw it too...
I guess it must be true...
But... Couldn't it just have been
fragments from the fireworks?
translation:
Well, knowing you Hiroyuki,
of course I wouldn't believe it!
But since ^P saw it too...
I guess it must be true...
But... Couldn't it just have been
fragments from the fireworks?

original:
Like I said, it's not! Come on,
you gotta believe me, Takuto!
Fireworks normally start with a
boom! And end with a bang!
What I saw was rounder, longer,
and ended with a whoosh!
translation:
Like I said, it's not! Come on,
you gotta believe me, Takuto!
Fireworks normally start with a
boom! And end with a bang!
What I saw was rounder, longer,
and ended with a whoosh!

original:
I didn't understand a single 
word of what you just said...
You and your wild imagination,
Hiroyuki...
translation:
I didn't understand a single 
word of what you just said...
You and your wild imagination,
Hiroyuki...

original:
...Wait, he's gone?! 
H-hey, wait a minute! Hiroyuki!
translation:
...Wait, he's gone?! 
H-hey, wait a minute! Hiroyuki!

original: Big bro, where are you going?
translation: Big bro, where are you going?

original:
Yui, just stay here with Asuka. 
I don't want you to get lost.
translation:
Yui, just stay here with Asuka. 
I don't want you to get lost.

original:
Hey now... Aren't you the one 
that's always getting lost?
I honestly feel sorry for Yui, 
having such a dumb brother.
translation:
Hey now... Aren't you the one 
that's always getting lost?
I honestly feel sorry for Yui, 
having such a dumb brother.

original:
Big bro! 
You shouldn't go by yourself!
translation:
Big bro! 
You shouldn't go by yourself!

original: Where'd Hiroyuki go...?!
translation: Where'd Hiroyuki go...?!

original:
He went off somewhere...

What's he so worked up about,
anyway?
translation:
He went off somewhere...

What's he so worked up about,
anyway?

original:
Apparently something fell just
beyond that hill, according to him.
translation:
Apparently something fell just
beyond that hill, according to him.

original:
Something fell...?

I do remember him tripping and
falling at that hill before, but...
translation:
Something fell...?

I do remember him tripping and
falling at that hill before, but...

original:
That always happens to my big 
brother when he gets excited.
translation:
That always happens to my big 
brother when he gets excited.

original:
Falling off a cliff...
Getting stuck in a ditch...
Knocking over Jizo statues...
Getting stuck in trees...
Something bad's really going 
to happen to him one day!
translation:
Falling off a cliff...
Getting stuck in a ditch...
Knocking over Jizo statues...
Getting stuck in trees...
Something bad's really going 
to happen to him one day!

original:
He really has been nothing but 
trouble, hasn't he?
translation:
He really has been nothing but 
trouble, hasn't he?

original:
Okay, fine...

There are a million things I'd rather 
do right now... 
(Sigh) I guess we should check on 
him.
translation:
Okay, fine...

There are a million things I'd rather 
do right now... 
(Sigh) I guess we should check on 
him.

original: Heeey!
translation: Heeey!

original: Hiroyukiii!
translation: Hiroyukiii!

original:
Big bro?!
Where are youuu?!
translation:
Big bro?!
Where are youuu?!

original:
Doesn't look like Hiroyuki's
around here, does it?
I guess he really did go over to 
that hill.
translation:
Doesn't look like Hiroyuki's
around here, does it?
I guess he really did go over to 
that hill.

original: Hey, Yui, wait for me!
translation: Hey, Yui, wait for me!

original:
W-wow...
I-It's pitch black out there...
That Hiroyuki really is just a
troublemaker...
translation:
W-wow...
I-It's pitch black out there...
That Hiroyuki really is just a
troublemaker...

original: Whoa?!
translation: Whoa?!

original:
B...big bro!
Be careful, it could be dangerous...!
translation:
B...big bro!
Be careful, it could be dangerous...!

original:
Hey, Hiroyuki...
W-what on earth is that?
translation:
Hey, Hiroyuki...
W-what on earth is that?

original:
Heh heh heh.

What do you mean? It's clearly 
a fallen star!
translation:
Heh heh heh.

What do you mean? It's clearly 
a fallen star!

original: ...Isn't that right, ^P?
translation: ...Isn't that right, ^P?

original:
...No way, I'm pretty certain it's 
anything but that...
H-how can you be so excited 
in a situation like this, anyway?
translation:
...No way, I'm pretty certain it's 
anything but that...
H-how can you be so excited 
in a situation like this, anyway?

original:
What do you mean?!

Relax, Asuka. 
Just think of the possibilities!
translation:
What do you mean?!

Relax, Asuka. 
Just think of the possibilities!

original:
You're the last person I want to
hear that from...
translation:
You're the last person I want to
hear that from...

original: Dinosaur! Dinosaur! Dinosaur!
translation: Dinosaur! Dinosaur! Dinosaur!

original:
What are you going on about? 
Have you finally lost your mind?
translation:
What are you going on about? 
Have you finally lost your mind?

original:
No, I think he's making a wish
right now.
My brother's been completely 
obsessed with dinosaurs, recently.
translation:
No, I think he's making a wish
right now.
My brother's been completely 
obsessed with dinosaurs, recently.

original:
I see... so that's why he was so
excited about this whole thing.
Falling into bushes and ditches, 
now he's fallen for dinosaurs...
Well, I guess we could probably
find a fossil or two around here...
translation:
I see... so that's why he was so
excited about this whole thing.
Falling into bushes and ditches, 
now he's fallen for dinosaurs...
Well, I guess we could probably
find a fossil or two around here...

original:
But a real life living, breathing
dinosaur would be amazing...!
T-rex! T-rex! T-rex!
Allosaurus! Allosaurus! Allosaurus!
translation:
But a real life living, breathing
dinosaur would be amazing...!
T-rex! T-rex! T-rex!
Allosaurus! Allosaurus! Allosaurus!

original:
H-hey, if your wish really does
come true...
Wouldn't you just end up becoming
a snack for those dinosaurs...?
translation:
H-hey, if your wish really does
come true...
Wouldn't you just end up becoming
a snack for those dinosaurs...?

original:
Plus, doesn't this look more like a
spaceship than a star?
translation:
Plus, doesn't this look more like a
spaceship than a star?

original:
Oh! That'd be amazing too!
Awesome! Aliens!
Come on out, aliens!!
translation:
Oh! That'd be amazing too!
Awesome! Aliens!
Come on out, aliens!!

original:
...Hold on, what was that?

I'm pretty sure I heard a noise
from those bushes over there...
translation:
...Hold on, what was that?

I'm pretty sure I heard a noise
from those bushes over there...

original: W-whoa?!
translation: W-whoa?!

original: It's a... dinosaur?!
translation: It's a... dinosaur?!

original: ...You're kidding me?!
translation: ...You're kidding me?!

original:
Look! It's got fangs! And claws!
That means it must be a carnivore!
Whoa! This is incredible!
Wishing on a star really does work!
translation:
Look! It's got fangs! And claws!
That means it must be a carnivore!
Whoa! This is incredible!
Wishing on a star really does work!

original:
The only thing that's incredible
is how stupid you are!
W-w-why did you even wish for
something like this?!
It's gonna eat us for sure if we
go near it!
translation:
The only thing that's incredible
is how stupid you are!
W-w-why did you even wish for
something like this?!
It's gonna eat us for sure if we
go near it!

original:
But wait a minute, doesn't it look
a bit...
...Squishy... for a dinosaur?
translation:
But wait a minute, doesn't it look
a bit...
...Squishy... for a dinosaur?

original: It's kinda cute...
translation: It's kinda cute...

original:
Wait, Yui!
Be careful, it might bite!
translation:
Wait, Yui!
Be careful, it might bite!

original:
Nice to meet ya.
My name's Agumon!
translation:
Nice to meet ya.
My name's Agumon!

original: ... It talks?!
translation: ... It talks?!

original:
Ummmmm...

Have you seen a Tamer anywhere
around here?
translation:
Ummmmm...

Have you seen a Tamer anywhere
around here?

original:
I have to get over the shock of
a talking dinosaur first,
let alone one that's asking us 
questions...
Maybe you could you explain to us 
what exactly a Tamer is?
translation:
I have to get over the shock of
a talking dinosaur first,
let alone one that's asking us 
questions...
Maybe you could you explain to us 
what exactly a Tamer is?

original:
They're humans who raise us 
Digimon.
According to this Digivice,
a Tamer should be around here.
translation:
They're humans who raise us 
Digimon.
According to this Digivice,
a Tamer should be around here.

original:
What will you do when you find
a Tamer?
translation:
What will you do when you find
a Tamer?

original:
I'll ask 'em to raise me!

Without a Tamer, we Digimon
can't grow big and strong!
That's why I'm here, looking 
for a Tamer who can raise me!
translation:
I'll ask 'em to raise me!

Without a Tamer, we Digimon
can't grow big and strong!
That's why I'm here, looking 
for a Tamer who can raise me!

original:
Doesn't that sound similar to 
looking for a mother...?
For such a cute little guy, you sure
are clever!
translation:
Doesn't that sound similar to 
looking for a mother...?
For such a cute little guy, you sure
are clever!

original:
Whoa...!
Did that thing just open up?!
translation:
Whoa...!
Did that thing just open up?!

original:
Does that mean something's 
about to come out?!
...Oh, I get it now!

That must be the Tamer you
were talking about earlier, right?
translation:
Does that mean something's 
about to come out?!
...Oh, I get it now!

That must be the Tamer you
were talking about earlier, right?

original:
The ones in there ARE Tamers,
yes, but...
... Those people are bad guys!

I'm not looking for someone 
who's like that...
Uhhh... How about we leave the
details for later!
At this rate, we'll be spotted! 
Everyone needs to hide...!
translation:
The ones in there ARE Tamers,
yes, but...
... Those people are bad guys!

I'm not looking for someone 
who's like that...
Uhhh... How about we leave the
details for later!
At this rate, we'll be spotted! 
Everyone needs to hide...!

original:
Then we should probably run, 
shouldn't we...?
translation:
Then we should probably run, 
shouldn't we...?

original:
Give it up, Dos! 
Just leave the ship be.
If it's not gonna work, then there's
no point fussin' over it.
Just hurry up and detach the
escape pod!
translation:
Give it up, Dos! 
Just leave the ship be.
If it's not gonna work, then there's
no point fussin' over it.
Just hurry up and detach the
escape pod!

original:
Yeah, yeah, just wait a moment,
Uno...
I can't detach it immediately.

After that explosion, the data's 
gotten all messed up, it seems.
Good grief...

But the ship's hatch is still opening, 
isn't it? I wonder why...?
translation:
Yeah, yeah, just wait a moment,
Uno...
I can't detach it immediately.

After that explosion, the data's 
gotten all messed up, it seems.
Good grief...

But the ship's hatch is still opening, 
isn't it? I wonder why...?

original:
As if I'd know. Just hurry up and 
do what you need to.
If we continue wastin' time here, 
we won't be able to get back.
translation:
As if I'd know. Just hurry up and 
do what you need to.
If we continue wastin' time here, 
we won't be able to get back.

original:
Tres! ...Tres!
...TRES!!!
Do you hear me!? What're you
doing dawdling around in there?
If you don't hurry up and get out 
here...
You'll get left behind, along with 
that Digimon!
translation:
Tres! ...Tres!
...TRES!!!
Do you hear me!? What're you
doing dawdling around in there?
If you don't hurry up and get out 
here...
You'll get left behind, along with 
that Digimon!

original:
Left behind...?!

They're planning to leave a 
Digimon here in this world?!
translation:
Left behind...?!

They're planning to leave a 
Digimon here in this world?!

original:
Looks like Tres isn't going to come
out.
translation:
Looks like Tres isn't going to come
out.

original:
What a pain, puttin' off such a 
simple job.
Hey Dos, you go drop off that
Digimon, instead.
Just throw it out if you want, 
it doesn't matter.
translation:
What a pain, puttin' off such a 
simple job.
Hey Dos, you go drop off that
Digimon, instead.
Just throw it out if you want, 
it doesn't matter.

original:
Despite saying its a simple job,
you don't want to do it, do you?
Alright then, I'll go take a look 
while the pod is detaching.
translation:
Despite saying its a simple job,
you don't want to do it, do you?
Alright then, I'll go take a look 
while the pod is detaching.

original:
Whoa... What is that!?
Could it be... an alien?!
... I... knew it! I knew all along that 
that thing was a spaceship!
translation:
Whoa... What is that!?
Could it be... an alien?!
... I... knew it! I knew all along that 
that thing was a spaceship!

original:
D-D-Didn't I say that from the 
start?!
We gotta get out of here! Come on,
^P! You too, Agumon!
translation:
D-D-Didn't I say that from the 
start?!
We gotta get out of here! Come on,
^P! You too, Agumon!

original:
...Hey, are we really going to just
leave it here?
translation:
...Hey, are we really going to just
leave it here?

original:
Haven't we gone over this already?

There's no point in whinin' over it
now!
translation:
Haven't we gone over this already?

There's no point in whinin' over it
now!

original:
Hmmm...
Well, I guess it's fine...
translation:
Hmmm...
Well, I guess it's fine...

original:
This place seems to be a fairly
good location.
Dark, humid... 
And it looks quite lively, too.
translation:
This place seems to be a fairly
good location.
Dark, humid... 
And it looks quite lively, too.

original: Let's get going.
translation: Let's get going.

original:
Nume! Nume!

I wanna go back with you! Don't 
leave me here, nume!
You promised we'd always be 
together, nume!
translation:
Nume! Nume!

I wanna go back with you! Don't 
leave me here, nume!
You promised we'd always be 
together, nume!

original:
Hey, ^P, 
I beg of you!
That Digimon needs our help!
So could you...
...become my Tamer?
translation:
Hey, ^P, 
I beg of you!
That Digimon needs our help!
So could you...
...become my Tamer?

original: Stop! You can't do this, Bandits!
translation: Stop! You can't do this, Bandits!

original:
Has this Digimon been following
us the whole time...?
translation:
Has this Digimon been following
us the whole time...?

original:
Why would you abandon your
Digimon?! Aren't you guys friends?!
If you leave a Digimon here, 
it'll cause a lot of trouble!
translation:
Why would you abandon your
Digimon?! Aren't you guys friends?!
If you leave a Digimon here, 
it'll cause a lot of trouble!

original:
Stay out of this! I don't take 
orders from brats!
You got a problem with this?

Well, come at me and see 
what happens!
translation:
Stay out of this! I don't take 
orders from brats!
You got a problem with this?

Well, come at me and see 
what happens!

original:
^P...
Are you ready to go?
translation:
^P...
Are you ready to go?

original:
So that one's got a Tamer now?
No wonder it's suddenly so brave.
Fine then. If you, by some miracle,
manage to beat us, 
we'll leave here without a fuss.
translation:
So that one's got a Tamer now?
No wonder it's suddenly so brave.
Fine then. If you, by some miracle,
manage to beat us, 
we'll leave here without a fuss.

original:
...Hey, ^P.

I don't have anyone in this world
that I can call a friend.
No one to rely on, nowhere to run,
nowhere to hide.
Despite that... are you willing to
fight together with me?
translation:
...Hey, ^P.

I don't have anyone in this world
that I can call a friend.
No one to rely on, nowhere to run,
nowhere to hide.
Despite that... are you willing to
fight together with me?

original:
Will you become Agumon's Tamer,
and fight by its side?
translation:
Will you become Agumon's Tamer,
and fight by its side?

original: Of course!
translation: Of course!

original: I won't fight...
translation: I won't fight...

original:
Come on, don't say that!
You gotta fight together with me.
translation:
Come on, don't say that!
You gotta fight together with me.

original:
Don't worry ^P, with you 
by my side, everything will be fine!
I chose you as my Tamer for a 
reason, after all!
translation:
Don't worry ^P, with you 
by my side, everything will be fine!
I chose you as my Tamer for a 
reason, after all!

original:
...We did it!

I knew you'd make an amazing 
Tamer, ^P!
translation:
...We did it!

I knew you'd make an amazing 
Tamer, ^P!

original:
Unbelieveable... To think we'd 
be beaten by some kid.
translation:
Unbelieveable... To think we'd 
be beaten by some kid.

original: ...How lame.
translation: ...How lame.

original:
What a fine mess we've gotten 
ourselves into. 
This is why I hate the real world!
translation:
What a fine mess we've gotten 
ourselves into. 
This is why I hate the real world!

original:
Are you okay, ^P?! 
We came back to rescue you!
translation:
Are you okay, ^P?! 
We came back to rescue you!

original:
How do you like that, aliens?!

Can't you see you're no match 
for our incredible strength!
translation:
How do you like that, aliens?!

Can't you see you're no match 
for our incredible strength!

original:
You promised you'd leave if we
won, didn't you?
Take Numemon with you and go
back to the Digital World!
translation:
You promised you'd leave if we
won, didn't you?
Take Numemon with you and go
back to the Digital World!

original:
Ugh, acting all tough just because
you got lucky...
translation:
Ugh, acting all tough just because
you got lucky...

original:
You were the one speaking so 
highly of yourself earlier.
Regardless of what you say, a loss
is a loss.
Don't go complaining about it after 
the fact.
translation:
You were the one speaking so 
highly of yourself earlier.
Regardless of what you say, a loss
is a loss.
Don't go complaining about it after 
the fact.

original:
...Hmph, whatever.

Numemon! How long do you plan
on standin' around!? We're leaving!
translation:
...Hmph, whatever.

Numemon! How long do you plan
on standin' around!? We're leaving!

original:
So long as I'm here on this planet...

There's no way I'll allow you aliens 
to have your way!
translation:
So long as I'm here on this planet...

There's no way I'll allow you aliens 
to have your way!

original:
Hmmm... So this is what a
monster from space looks like?
I didn't think it would look so... 
pathetic?!
translation:
Hmmm... So this is what a
monster from space looks like?
I didn't think it would look so... 
pathetic?!

original:
I'm glad you're safe, ^P.
You're not hurt, are you, Agumon?
...I'm sorry for running away and
leaving you two behind.
translation:
I'm glad you're safe, ^P.
You're not hurt, are you, Agumon?
...I'm sorry for running away and
leaving you two behind.

original:
Hey, ^P,

Did you and Agumon manage to
defeat that weird green monster?
translation:
Hey, ^P,

Did you and Agumon manage to
defeat that weird green monster?

original:
That creature's the same as me,
a Digimon called Numemon.
It's always been partners with 
those Bandits in the Digital World.
So I wonder why they
suddenly tried to abandon it...?
translation:
That creature's the same as me,
a Digimon called Numemon.
It's always been partners with 
those Bandits in the Digital World.
So I wonder why they
suddenly tried to abandon it...?

original:
Is this 'Digital World' the planet 
that you came from?
translation:
Is this 'Digital World' the planet 
that you came from?

original:
It's not a planet, but a whole 
different world.
translation:
It's not a planet, but a whole 
different world.

original:
A different world...?

Brother, what are you doing?
translation:
A different world...?

Brother, what are you doing?

original:
So this guy's the same creature 
as Agumon...?
translation:
So this guy's the same creature 
as Agumon...?

original:
Is it dangerous to touch? 
It's still moving around...
translation:
Is it dangerous to touch? 
It's still moving around...

original:
Don't worry.

If anything happens, 
I'll protect you!
translation:
Don't worry.

If anything happens, 
I'll protect you!

original: Yui! Takuto! Hiroyuki!
translation: Yui! Takuto! Hiroyuki!

original:
Everyone's going to be taken
to the Digital World!
^P, we've gotta get into
the DigiShip! Hurry!
translation:
Everyone's going to be taken
to the Digital World!
^P, we've gotta get into
the DigiShip! Hurry!

original:
...Huh?

Where... am I...?
translation:
...Huh?

Where... am I...?

original:
Uhmm... If I remember correctly...

Yui and the others were taken
onto that strange ship...
And then...

... What happened after that...?
translation:
Uhmm... If I remember correctly...

Yui and the others were taken
onto that strange ship...
And then...

... What happened after that...?

original:
This place is giving me the creeps...

It's pitch black, humid, and it 
stinks, too...
EEK-!?!

S-s-s-something slimy just 
touched me!
What is this... small, cold jiggly
stuff...
...There's more than one...?!

H-hey... Yui?! Takuto?! 
Hiroyuki...?!
Is anyone there?! 
^P!?
translation:
This place is giving me the creeps...

It's pitch black, humid, and it 
stinks, too...
EEK-!?!

S-s-s-something slimy just 
touched me!
What is this... small, cold jiggly
stuff...
...There's more than one...?!

H-hey... Yui?! Takuto?! 
Hiroyuki...?!
Is anyone there?! 
^P!?

original: What was that noise just now...?
translation: What was that noise just now...?

original:
Wha-... Just what is going on?! 
Hey, come on!
Anyone, say something!
translation:
Wha-... Just what is going on?! 
Hey, come on!
Anyone, say something!

original:
EMERGENCY! EMERGENCY!
BRACE FOR IMPACT!
CARGO EJECTION COUNTDOWN
IS ABOUT TO COMMENCE!
EMERGENCY, EMERGENCY
BRACE FOR IMPACT!
translation:
EMERGENCY! EMERGENCY!
BRACE FOR IMPACT!
CARGO EJECTION COUNTDOWN
IS ABOUT TO COMMENCE!
EMERGENCY, EMERGENCY
BRACE FOR IMPACT!

original: WHAAAAT...?!
translation: WHAAAAT...?!

original:
... It's no use. I don't hear any
trace of a heartbeat.
translation:
... It's no use. I don't hear any
trace of a heartbeat.

original:
That's not where the heart is!
Don't go saying something like that!
translation:
That's not where the heart is!
Don't go saying something like that!

original: ...Oh, you're awake?!
translation: ...Oh, you're awake?!

original:
...^P, are you alright?

This is the world us Digimon live in.
It's called the Digital World.
This island is called North Bridge, 
on Motherboard Continent.
Let's see...

Do you remember being on the
Bandits' DigiShip?
translation:
...^P, are you alright?

This is the world us Digimon live in.
It's called the Digital World.
This island is called North Bridge, 
on Motherboard Continent.
Let's see...

Do you remember being on the
Bandits' DigiShip?

original:
I heard something about an 
'Emergency', but...
Was the ship under attack by
someone...?
translation:
I heard something about an 
'Emergency', but...
Was the ship under attack by
someone...?

original:
Hmm... I don't think it was 
attacked... 
I think that someone may have 
pressed the emergency exit button.
translation:
Hmm... I don't think it was 
attacked... 
I think that someone may have 
pressed the emergency exit button.

original: Someone...?
translation: Someone...?

original:
Geh!

Well... I mean... The button was... 
it was...
...Just so tempting... it was 
asking to be pressed...!
R-really... it was impossible to
just ignore it...!
Seeing a button, anyone
would be tempted to press it, right?
Wouldn't you? You would! You
totally would!... ...Right?
translation:
Geh!

Well... I mean... The button was... 
it was...
...Just so tempting... it was 
asking to be pressed...!
R-really... it was impossible to
just ignore it...!
Seeing a button, anyone
would be tempted to press it, right?
Wouldn't you? You would! You
totally would!... ...Right?

original:
Of course you'd be the guilty one!

What's going on in that brain of
yours?!
Going and doing something crazy 
like that, think before you act!
translation:
Of course you'd be the guilty one!

What's going on in that brain of
yours?!
Going and doing something crazy 
like that, think before you act!

original:
Well... it's just...

I guess I was just following my 
heart...?
translation:
Well... it's just...

I guess I was just following my 
heart...?

original:
..................
...I see, so that's how it is.
translation:
..................
...I see, so that's how it is.

original:
Then I'll just follow mine too. 

I'll just act...
true to my own feelings...
translation:
Then I'll just follow mine too. 

I'll just act...
true to my own feelings...

original:
H-hey... Wait a minute, Asuka!
Why the sudden change in tone?
I'm sorry, I understand now, so 
please cut it out!
When you say you'll follow your 
heart...
Y-you're totally thinking about 
punching me, aren't you?!
translation:
H-hey... Wait a minute, Asuka!
Why the sudden change in tone?
I'm sorry, I understand now, so 
please cut it out!
When you say you'll follow your 
heart...
Y-you're totally thinking about 
punching me, aren't you?!

original: Hey, guys..?
translation: Hey, guys..?

original:
There's something I still need to 
tell you.
translation:
There's something I still need to 
tell you.

original: What is it?
translation: What is it?

original:
...I see! I get it!

Agumon is also the type who sees
a button and needs to press it!
translation:
...I see! I get it!

Agumon is also the type who sees
a button and needs to press it!

original:
Be. 
Quiet.
translation:
Be. 
Quiet.

original: ...Yes ma'am, sorry ma'am.
translation: ...Yes ma'am, sorry ma'am.

original:
First, as you know, we don't have
our own DigiShip.
translation:
First, as you know, we don't have
our own DigiShip.

original:
Which means it'll be a while before
you're able to return to your world.
translation:
Which means it'll be a while before
you're able to return to your world.

original:
Huh? Then how did you come to
our world, Agumon?
translation:
Huh? Then how did you come to
our world, Agumon?

original:
I hitched a ride on the Bandits' 
DigiShip...
But don't worry, we'll be ok! If we 
just go to where my friends are,
Then we can find a DigiShip of our
own!
translation:
I hitched a ride on the Bandits' 
DigiShip...
But don't worry, we'll be ok! If we 
just go to where my friends are,
Then we can find a DigiShip of our
own!

original:
I see... Then let's hurry and go
meet with your friends!
translation:
I see... Then let's hurry and go
meet with your friends!

original:
Yeah, but before that, just listen
to me for a second, okay?
translation:
Yeah, but before that, just listen
to me for a second, okay?

original:
There is a place ahead of here
known as the DigiBase,
That is where my friends live, and
that's where we need to go.
But before that, there are many
wild Digimon in this area...
If you get too close to them, 
they won't hesitate to attack you.
translation:
There is a place ahead of here
known as the DigiBase,
That is where my friends live, and
that's where we need to go.
But before that, there are many
wild Digimon in this area...
If you get too close to them, 
they won't hesitate to attack you.

original: R-really?!
translation: R-really?!

original:
But it'll be okay! 
I'll do my best to protect you guys.
On top of that, ^P is a
great Tamer!
translation:
But it'll be okay! 
I'll do my best to protect you guys.
On top of that, ^P is a
great Tamer!

original:
That reminds me... ^P, 
I forgot to give this to you earlier.
It's a symbol of you becoming a
Tamer. It's called a 'Digivice'.
translation:
That reminds me... ^P, 
I forgot to give this to you earlier.
It's a symbol of you becoming a
Tamer. It's called a 'Digivice'.

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
When you want to use it, just 
press either the Start or X Button.
Once the Digivice starts up, 
you'll see the Menu screen.
translation:
When you want to use it, just 
press either the Start or X Button.
Once the Digivice starts up, 
you'll see the Menu screen.

original:
There's one more thing I'd like to
ask of you, ^P.
translation:
There's one more thing I'd like to
ask of you, ^P.

original:
When a Tamer acknowledges a
Digimon as their Partner,
The Tamer can then give that 
Digimon a nickname.
So... I'd like it if you could give
me a nickname, too!
translation:
When a Tamer acknowledges a
Digimon as their Partner,
The Tamer can then give that 
Digimon a nickname.
So... I'd like it if you could give
me a nickname, too!

original:
My name is...
^0!?
..................

I like it! Thank you, ^P!
translation:
My name is...
^0!?
..................

I like it! Thank you, ^P!

original:
There's no need to apologize,

Rather, it's Hiroyuki who should
be apologizing to everyone...
translation:
There's no need to apologize,

Rather, it's Hiroyuki who should
be apologizing to everyone...

original:
Wait a minute...

I feel like we've forgotten 
something important...
translation:
Wait a minute...

I feel like we've forgotten 
something important...

original:
Oh... about that...

I didn't mention it earlier, but...

Those little ones you were with 
earlier...
translation:
Oh... about that...

I didn't mention it earlier, but...

Those little ones you were with 
earlier...

original:
That's it! 
Where are Yui and Takuto...?!
translation:
That's it! 
Where are Yui and Takuto...?!

original:
We must have gotten separated
during the ejection.
translation:
We must have gotten separated
during the ejection.

original: WHAAAT?!
translation: WHAAAT?!

original:
I-I-It'll be alright! We can ask 
around at the DigiBase!
My friends can help come up with
a way to find them!
But this place is dangerous, we 
need to hurry to the DigiBase 
right away.
...Okay?
translation:
I-I-It'll be alright! We can ask 
around at the DigiBase!
My friends can help come up with
a way to find them!
But this place is dangerous, we 
need to hurry to the DigiBase 
right away.
...Okay?

original:
Gabumon?! Hey, Gabumon?!
What's wrong?!
translation:
Gabumon?! Hey, Gabumon?!
What's wrong?!

original:
Come on, wake up!

This is no place to be zoning out,
it's dangerous here!
translation:
Come on, wake up!

This is no place to be zoning out,
it's dangerous here!

original: GABUMON!!!
translation: GABUMON!!!

original:
...Huh?

Oh, if it isn't Agumon. It's been a 
while since I last saw you.
I thought you'd gone off to look for
a Tamer.
translation:
...Huh?

Oh, if it isn't Agumon. It's been a 
while since I last saw you.
I thought you'd gone off to look for
a Tamer.

original:
I went to the Real World to find 
one.
Just what on earth are you doing 
out here?
translation:
I went to the Real World to find 
one.
Just what on earth are you doing 
out here?

original:
I could be asking you the same
thing...
I was out here looking for Bug
Plates.
But I was suddenly electrocuted 
from behind by something.
I can't believe it! They took all of 
my Bug Plates!
Could it have been the work of 
those Bandits again...?!
translation:
I could be asking you the same
thing...
I was out here looking for Bug
Plates.
But I was suddenly electrocuted 
from behind by something.
I can't believe it! They took all of 
my Bug Plates!
Could it have been the work of 
those Bandits again...?!

original:
...Huh?

If you were only just attacked, then
it couldn't have been them.
After all, we were with them only
a moment ago.
translation:
...Huh?

If you were only just attacked, then
it couldn't have been them.
After all, we were with them only
a moment ago.

original:
It must have been one of their 
allies or something!
There's no one else who'd have
a reason to steal Bug Plates!
translation:
It must have been one of their 
allies or something!
There's no one else who'd have
a reason to steal Bug Plates!

original:
Oh, that reminds me! I should 
introduce you two!
This human here is from the real 
world. They're my new Tamer.
Their name is ^P!
translation:
Oh, that reminds me! I should 
introduce you two!
This human here is from the real 
world. They're my new Tamer.
Their name is ^P!

original:
Oh, congratulations! 
You finally found yourself a Tamer!
translation:
Oh, congratulations! 
You finally found yourself a Tamer!

original:
Yeah! And ^P is one 
amazing Tamer!
Even though we'd only just met,
they destroyed those Bandits!
translation:
Yeah! And ^P is one 
amazing Tamer!
Even though we'd only just met,
they destroyed those Bandits!

original:
That's no simple feat, you really
must have skill!
We haven't had any Tamers visit 
here in a very long time.
I'm sure everyone will be excited 
to welcome you here!
translation:
That's no simple feat, you really
must have skill!
We haven't had any Tamers visit 
here in a very long time.
I'm sure everyone will be excited 
to welcome you here!

original:
Hey, Gabumon.

We're currently on our way to the
DigiBase.
Why don't you come back with us?

The more the merrier, right?
translation:
Hey, Gabumon.

We're currently on our way to the
DigiBase.
Why don't you come back with us?

The more the merrier, right?

original: That's true... Alright! I'll join you!
translation: That's true... Alright! I'll join you!

original:
Great! Since you're going to join
our team...
Why don't we have ^P 
give you a nickname?
After all, ^P can be a 
Tamer for both of us... right?
translation:
Great! Since you're going to join
our team...
Why don't we have ^P 
give you a nickname?
After all, ^P can be a 
Tamer for both of us... right?

original:
My name is...　^0！？

……………

I like it! Thank you, ^P!
translation:
My name is...　^0！？

……………

I like it! Thank you, ^P!

original:
I see, so my nickname will be
^0!
I like it! Thank you, ^P!
translation:
I see, so my nickname will be
^0!
I like it! Thank you, ^P!

original: Now let's head to the DigiBase!
translation: Now let's head to the DigiBase!

original: ...Gabumon?!
translation: ...Gabumon?!

original: Hey, are you ok?!
translation: Hey, are you ok?!

original:
Gabumon...

Gabumon's not reacting at all, even
though we know each other...
We have to get over there and
find out what's going on!
translation:
Gabumon...

Gabumon's not reacting at all, even
though we know each other...
We have to get over there and
find out what's going on!

original:
Now's not the time to head 
straight to the DigiBase!
We can't just leave Gabumon alone
like this!
translation:
Now's not the time to head 
straight to the DigiBase!
We can't just leave Gabumon alone
like this!

original:
Welcome back, Gabumon! I'm glad
you returned safely!
...And you've brought Agumon
back with you?
translation:
Welcome back, Gabumon! I'm glad
you returned safely!
...And you've brought Agumon
back with you?

original:
I went to the Real World!

On the way back, I ran into 
Gabumon.
translation:
I went to the Real World!

On the way back, I ran into 
Gabumon.

original:
I was gathering Plates that could
be added to the Evolution Tree,
But... something attacked me and 
ended up stealing them all...
I didn't get to see their face, 
but I'm sure it was those Bandits.
translation:
I was gathering Plates that could
be added to the Evolution Tree,
But... something attacked me and 
ended up stealing them all...
I didn't get to see their face, 
but I'm sure it was those Bandits.

original:
That's terrible...

But what exactly is their
goal in stealing the Plates...?
The only place they can be used
is on the Tree, inside the DigiBase.
...Oh? Agumon, who're those
humans with you?
translation:
That's terrible...

But what exactly is their
goal in stealing the Plates...?
The only place they can be used
is on the Tree, inside the DigiBase.
...Oh? Agumon, who're those
humans with you?

original:
I met in them in the Real World. 
This is Asuka, Hiroyuki,
And this is my Tamer, ^P!
They came to help us!
translation:
I met in them in the Real World. 
This is Asuka, Hiroyuki,
And this is my Tamer, ^P!
They came to help us!

original:
Is that right?! Amazing! 
I can't believe it...!
I thought there were no more 
Tamers here...
Are you really willing to help us 
out??
translation:
Is that right?! Amazing! 
I can't believe it...!
I thought there were no more 
Tamers here...
Are you really willing to help us 
out??

original:
Of course! Just leave it all to us!

Rest assured, with us on board, 
you've got nothin' to worry about!
translation:
Of course! Just leave it all to us!

Rest assured, with us on board, 
you've got nothin' to worry about!

original:
There you go again, saying things 
so carelessly...
It was your fault we ended up
being ejected from that ship...
translation:
There you go again, saying things 
so carelessly...
It was your fault we ended up
being ejected from that ship...

original:
Hey, you mentioned those Bandits
before, right?
Do you happen to know where we
can find them?
translation:
Hey, you mentioned those Bandits
before, right?
Do you happen to know where we
can find them?

original:
There are two young kids who may
be with them right now.
They might be somewhere on
their DigiShip.
translation:
There are two young kids who may
be with them right now.
They might be somewhere on
their DigiShip.

original:
Even when we don't want to see 
them, they tend to show up.
However, we don't exactly know
where they could be right now...
We can return to the DigiBase and
I'll do some investigating.
translation:
Even when we don't want to see 
them, they tend to show up.
However, we don't exactly know
where they could be right now...
We can return to the DigiBase and
I'll do some investigating.

original:
Could you also help us find a 
DigiShip of our own?
If we need to travel far, or if these
children want to return home,
We'll need a DigiShip.
translation:
Could you also help us find a 
DigiShip of our own?
If we need to travel far, or if these
children want to return home,
We'll need a DigiShip.

original:
I understand, I'll look into that too.
But for now, everyone, please feel
free to rest up in the DigiBase.
...Alright?
translation:
I understand, I'll look into that too.
But for now, everyone, please feel
free to rest up in the DigiBase.
...Alright?

original:
Everyone, welcome to our
DigiBase!
translation:
Everyone, welcome to our
DigiBase!

original:
Hey Lopmon, is the server still
inaccessible?
I have a few things I really need
to look into...
translation:
Hey Lopmon, is the server still
inaccessible?
I have a few things I really need
to look into...

original:
Recently the server has been in 
pretty bad condition.
Gatomon's been investigating it,
but we don't know the cause, yet.
translation:
Recently the server has been in 
pretty bad condition.
Gatomon's been investigating it,
but we don't know the cause, yet.
